channel.title: [Pi] Cache help [Pi]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I needed my to repack itself so I added all the new files I need like obj.dat and my Raw folder and stuff, I deleted all my main_file_caches, and re-opened the client. It loaded the cache library and remade the main_file_cache stuff. But after it's done Loading Cache Library, it says Error Connecting to server, and in my CMD it has this error.
[img]http://oi46.tinypic.com/2aiovvn.jpg[/img]
Can anybody help me out?
